content:
Scenario: Teen co-workers coordinate through care economy networks
    Given Jasmine works with other teens and young adults
    And worker solidarity improves conditions for all
    When teen workers coordinate through care economy
    Then workplace_elohim should facilitate peer worker networks
    And support information sharing about workplace conditions
    And enable collective advocacy for better treatment
    And help young workers recognize common interests
    And build understanding that workers have power through solidarity
    And demonstrate care economy principles in workplace organizing
